channel.title: Help me with one quick problem
channel.description:
OK, Here's a quick question(I've used the search button and google). I am using EasyRSC and I am trying to connect it to my server IP. It works fine on localhost(or 127.0.0.1) but when I tried it with my server IP, It wont connect to the server. Where in the server files do I change the IP? I've looked in server.java (where a lot of the threads were talking about) but I didn't find anything. Please Help! -Ghostly150
EDIT:
Anyone? please?

item.title: Help me with one quick problem
item.dc:creator: @demon_noen demon noen
item.source: Help me with one quick problem

item.title: Help me with one quick problem
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

since u said u changed the ip in ur client to ur whatismyip.com change your server.java ip to your 192.x.x.x look for localhost replace that with the 192 ip.

Read full topic

u must not have used search or u wouldnt need to ask simple questions in server.java search for localhost put ur 192.x.x.x and in your client settings put your whatismyip ip.
